title: Handwriting to LaTeX Conversion Program
description: Developing a program to convert handwriting images into LaTeX documents, embedding positional differences for formatting. Assembled a Visual Transformer architecture with attention on structured handwriting data, dividing input images into chunks.

title: Multi-modal Audio Classification with Signal Processing
description: Utilized Mel Spectrograms to convert time-series data to a logarithmic scale, sampling at 48kHz to avoid outliers. Built a music classification program with RNN-CNN joint architecture and double-layered LSTM, achieving 80% accuracy

title: Computer Vision Pose Estimation
description: Utilized PyTorch and time-series animal behavioral data to optimize 3D pose estimation + phenotyping conclusions with SLEAP, using Kalman filtering, 3D CNN-based triangulation, graph NNs, and part affinity fields (PAFs) for multi-animal segmentation.

title: Facial Recognition UI
description: Applied computer vision techniques such as facial landmarking and convolution to build a facial recognition classification pipeline. Built a demo UI hosted on Apache using Flask, imported the postprocessed model trained in an AWS SageMaker environment.

title: CarPro-S
description: Built an AI-powered driving kit with an RPI, camera, pressure sensors and backend live-time CV model, to detect unsafe driving. Optimized facial landmark detection using TensorFlow, CV2, and SVMs, improving gaze tracking with hyperparameter tuning.

title: DSC 106: Project 02
description: Project 2 for DSC 106, a data visualization course at UCSD. The project involved creating data visualizations for two opposing propositions, with the same dataset.
